flavorText: Among the Vulshok, the most prized blades are those that killed their original owners.

foreignData.flavorText: Unter den Vulshok werden die Klingen am höchsten gehandelt, die ihre ursprünglichen Besitzer getötet haben.
foreignData.name: Magnetischer Diebstahl
foreignData.text: Lege eine Ausrüstung deiner Wahl an eine Kreatur deiner Wahl an. (Die Kontrolle über die Ausrüstung ändert sich nicht.)

foreignData.flavorText: Entre los vúlshok, las hojas más preciadas son aquellas que mataron a sus dueños originales.
foreignData.name: Robo magnético
foreignData.text: Anexa el equipo objetivo a la criatura objetivo. (El control del equipo no cambia.)

foreignData.flavorText: Chez les Vulshoks, les lames les plus prisées sont celles qui ont tué leur ancien propriétaire.
foreignData.name: Détournement magnétique
foreignData.text: Attachez l'équipement ciblé à la créature ciblée. (Le contrôle de l'équipement ne change pas.)

foreignData.flavorText: Tra i Vulshok, le lame più ricercate sono quelle che hanno ucciso i loro proprietari originali.
foreignData.name: Furto Magnetico
foreignData.text: Assegna l'Equipaggiamento bersaglio a una creatura bersaglio. (Il controllo dell'Equipaggiamento non cambia.)

foreignData.flavorText: ヴァルショクの中では、持ち主自身を殺した剣こそが最も高い値をつける。
foreignData.name: 磁力窃盗
foreignData.text: 装備品１つとクリーチャー１体を対象とし、その装備品をそのクリーチャーにつける。（装備品のコントロールは変わらない。）

foreignData.flavorText: Dentre os Vulshoques, as lâminas mais apreciadas são as que mataram seus donos originais.
foreignData.name: Roubo Magnético
foreignData.text: Anexe o Equipamento alvo à criatura alvo. (O controle do Equipamento não é alterado.)

foreignData.flavorText: 取过原先主人性命的武器，在瓦许克人眼中格外珍贵。
foreignData.name: 磁力窃取
foreignData.text: 将目标武具装备在目标生物上。（武具的操控权并未改变）

name: Magnetic Theft
originalText: Attach target Equipment to target creature. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

rulings.text: Magnetic Theft can cause an Equipment one player controls to be attached to a creature another player controls. The controller of the Equipment can pay the equip cost to move the Equipment to a creature they control (but only any time that player could cast a sorcery).

text: Attach target Equipment to target creature. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)
